subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa closed in on the last point she needs to qualify for the L.P.G.A. Tour Hall of Fame, shooting her third straight seven-under-par 66 to take a seven-stroke lead in the Corona Championship in Morelia, Mexico. If Ochoa, 26, wins Sunday, she will become the youngest player to qualify for the Hall of Fame.
